author: oching
msg: o revert changes made in -r1092648 in csrf check for remove project group
o check only on actual delete, do not check on confirm delete -- separated remove project group and confirm remove project group into separate actions

author: aadamchik
msg: DataContextPrefetchQualifierOverlapTest (plus switching data set setup to the new API)

author: norman
msg: CRLFTerminatedInputStream did not respect the buffer offset in all case which could block the RETRCmdHandler forever. See JAMES-1222

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1091107 (and some earlier changes), update the content_state
variable properly on obstructed and shadowed files.
(close_file): Make sure content_state is set for obstructions and shadowed
nodes. The new value is what it would be set to before r1091107.

author: coheigea
msg: Made some efficiency improvements to XMLSignatureInput. This should address the out of memory problems when using an InputStream from a zip file.
